articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Soldier-builders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Soldier-builders
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with soldier-builders of KPA Units 966, 462, 101, 489 who performed labor feats in building the workers' hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 Kim Jong Un sent a warm salute to the soldier-builders, waving back to their enthusiastic cheers.
					
					 He highly appreciated their feats, saying that the hostel is a shining structure built thanks to the patriotic devotion and work style of the KPA, a standard-bearer in realizing the idea of the party and defending its policies.
					
					 Noting that world-startling miracles were being performed in various parts of the country one after another thanks to the heroic struggle of the KPA, he expressed his expectation and belief that the soldier-builders would display their honor of being a death-defying corps and a scouting party in the worthwhile struggle to build a thriving nation in the future, too, and fulfill their mission and duty as the defenders of the country and creators of the happiness of its people.
					
					 Present at the event were Hwang Pyong So, Jang Jong Nam, and Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Guatemalan Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Guatemalan Ambassador
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Gustavo Adolfo Lopez Calderon, Guatemalan ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian PMs
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Abdel Malik Sellal on his appointment as prime minister of Algeria. 
					 The message wished him and the Algerian government successes in their future work for stability and economic development of the country, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Chad
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Chad
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Kalzeube Pahimi upon his reappointment as prime minister of Chad.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for consolidating the national unity and achieving the country's economic development and progress.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a congratulatory message to Moussa Faki Mahamat upon his reappointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and African Integration of Chad.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Institute
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Institute
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations.
					 Fu Mengzi, vice-president of the institute and head of its delegation on a visit to the DPRK, conveyed the gift to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Reception Given by Polish Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given by Polish Embassy
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Polish embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday on the occasion of the Constitutional Day, the national day of Poland.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Kwak Il Ryong, vice-minister of Land and Maritime Transport, officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Charge d'Affaires A.I. Tomasz Kaznowski and staff members of the Polish embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: NPCK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
NPCK Delegation Leaves for Chinae
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Peace Committee of Korea (NPCK) led by Vice-Chairman Kim Jin Bom left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: 40th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
40th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Tuesday to mark the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Party's Media Is a Powerful Ideological Weapon Which Contributes to Modeling the Whole of Society on Kimilsungism". 
					 The work, published on May 7, Juche 63 (1974), comprehensively clarifies the nature, mission, action principle and duty of media based on Kimilsungism and the ways for implementing them. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the ministries and national institutions, and officials, journalists and media persons in the field of media. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam in his report said that the work is an immortal library as it gave scientific answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in developing the media of the Workers' Party of Korea into the most revolutionary ideological weapon serving the purpose of implementing the leader's idea and cause. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 During the past four decades the idea and theory of the work have been successfully embodied under the leadership of the party and the leader, radically changing the appearance of our party's media and powerfully demonstrating their might. 
					
					 The exploits of Kim Jong Il are being carried forward and developed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un made the historic speech "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea. It is a noteworthy event which brought about a landmark turn in the media activities to successfully carry out the important tasks for the party's ideological work at present. 
					
					 The reporter called upon the journalists and other media persons to become buglers sounding the advance for the final victory as those of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army did.

articles.title: 10th National Machine Design Festival Opens
articles.content:
10th National Machine Design Festival Opens
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The 10th national machine design festival opened with due ceremony at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition on Tuesday. 
					 Participating in the festival are designers, teachers, researchers, technicians and members of the three revolution teams at more than 130 units including designing and industrial art studios, educational and scientific research institutions. 
					
					 Displayed and published at the festival are designs of machines including latest machine tools, mining and electrical machines, vehicles, construction, textile, foodstuff and farm machines and research data for development of designing technology and support programs for machine designs. 
					
					 The festival also involves a prize contest in designs of all kinds of tools, sensors and control devices for building integrated control system and putting production processes on unmanned and CNC basis, designing of equipment necessary for renewable technology of energy and raw materials and renewing resources, etc. 
					
					 There will be a contest in multi-dimensional designs, lectures on the trend of the development of machine designing and latest technology and technological exchange and service for latest designing technology data and exhibits. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Jong Guk, minister of Machine Industry, Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, officials and other people of the machine designing and industrial art studios, educational and scientific research institutions. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the venue of the festival.

articles.title: DPRK Puts Spurs to Fishery
articles.content:
DPRK Puts Spurs to Fishery
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid big efforts to making big fish hauls.
					 Fishery stations in the East Sea of Korea are catching large quantities of fish by introducing effective fishing methods.
					
					 Fishing stations in the West Sea, after starting fishing earlier than usual this year, are carrying on fishing operations in the main fishing grounds. Measures have been taken for storing fish while making preparations for deep-sea fishing.
					
					 Signal successes have been made in increasing output of various species of seaweed.
					
					 The stations are also making efforts to beef up their material and technical foundations to put fishing on a scientific basis.

articles.title: Young People Volunteer in Difficult Jobs in DPRK
articles.content:
Young People Volunteer in Difficult Jobs in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Many young people are volunteering in difficult jobs to make contribution to the building of a thriving nation in the DPRK.
					 More than 150 000 youngsters volunteered to work in collieries, mines and farms in 2001, including graduates of the then Unha Higher Middle School in Yangdok County, South Phyongan Province.
					
					 When visiting the Unhung Cooperative Farm in Taechon County in July, Juche 97 (2008), leader Kim Jong Il met a girl who volunteered for the farm from Pyongyang to praise her patriotic deed.
					
					 He said young people in other countries try hard for citizenship of their capital cities but Korean youth are volunteering for farms, mines and virgin lands from the capital city of Pyongyang, stressing that it is the true looks of the young Korean people who have always been loyal to the party and the revolution.
					
					 The number of young volunteers is on the increase in the DPRK as the days go by.
					
					 Some of the graduates from Kim Jong Suk University of Education volunteered for the northern railway reconstruction project and a brother-and-sister eightsome for the Ryongyang Mine after their graduation from Pyongyang Munsin Middle School.
					
					 After the promulgation of the law on enforcement of universal 12-year compulsory education system, many graduates from universities of education and teacher training colleges volunteered to be teachers of those schools on frontline islands and in mountainous villages.
					
					 On March 31, 11 graduates from a university of education and a teacher training college in South Hwanghae Province volunteered for island schools.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un expressed his conviction that the prosperity of the country will be brought earlier by devoted efforts of the young people.

articles.title: News Analyst on U.S. "Provocation and Threat" Ballad
articles.content:
News Analyst on U.S. "Provocation and Threat" Ballad
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The United States would pick on those countries going against its grain every time, while clamoring about "provocation" and "threat" from them.
					 The same applies to the DPRK, too.
					
					 The situation of the Korean Peninsula has deteriorated in February-April and August every year, mainly due to the U.S. which stages with south Korea large-scale joint military exercises codenamed Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian. Such actions would destroy peace and stability of the peninsula and spoil the efforts for improved north-south relations.
					
					 The purpose of the exercises is to round off the U.S. scenario for aggression on the DPRK, with "occupation of Pyongyang" as a main goal, under the simulated conditions of a real war. Involved in them are huge armed forces enough to conduct an overall war, as well as U.S. latest weaponry and means for a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 This year the U.S. and south Korea staged the Ssangyong landing operational drill and the Max Thunder air battle drill as part of the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, arousing serious concern among peoples at home and abroad.
					
					 Such exercises are evidently a provocation to the DPRK and a direct threat aimed to wreck peace on the peninsula and the rest of the world and bring dark clouds of a nuclear war. So, it is quite natural and an exercise of legitimate rights for the DPRK to take self-defensive actions against the provocative moves.
					
					 However, the U.S. has described the DPRK's exercise of rights as "provocation" and "threat" in a bid to deceive the world community. 
					
					 In this regard, Marcel Cartier, an American who visited the DPRK as a tourist shortly ago, said jeering at this American-style gangster logic: "Let's consider if the North Korean military was holding military drills annually off the coast of New York that simulated the occupation of the entirety of the country. Would it not be sensible given that context for Americans to develop a nuclear deterrent? The Koreans are not war hungry. However given the way that the situation in Libya played out, they are all the more convinced -- rightfully so -- that the only reason their independent state continues to stand is due to the Songun (military-first policy) and the existence of nuclear capabilities".
					
					 The U.S. should be mindful that its impudent behavior will bring irrevocable and deadly disasters to itself. This is a stern warning given by the history for justice and peace.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Backing Japan's Militarist Moves
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Backing Japan's Militarist Moves
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Obama formally expressed support for Japan's will to exercise the right to collective self-defense during his recent junket to Japan, the behavior unprecedented among the successive U.S. presidents.
					 This brought to light the U.S. brigandish scenario to use Japan as a shock brigade for carrying out its strategy for dominating the world.  However, Obama's behavior is little short of inviting misfortune.
					
					 The U.S. is now working hard to give a shot in the arm of Japan, an inferior ally, in a bid to realize its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific. To this end, the former is zealously backing the latter in its moves to bolster up its forces and build legal and institutional mechanisms for waging a war such as Japan's exercise of the right to collective self-defense. 
					
					 Japan is a war criminal state which was severely punished by the international community for its crimes of aggression in the last century. It is also a dangerous country which has desperately watched for a chance to launch reinvasion since its defeat, far from thoroughly redeeming its crime-woven past with sincere efforts.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that in case Japan is allowed to exercise the right to collective self-defense, something banned by the international order and its domestic law in the post-war period, this will be misused as a criminal lever for legalizing Japan's moves for reinvasion.
					
					 The U.S. makes no scruple of bringing disasters again to humankind by doing so in a bid to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. has only met repeated failures of its hostile policy toward the DPRK. However, it is now trying hard to realize its wild ambition to dominate Asia by using Japan as a shock brigade.
					
					 In the light of the wicked and ferocious nature of Japan, no one can vouch that such U.S. policy toward Japan would not prove counter-productive.
					
					 In the past Japan used to stage its carefully arranged farces to demonstrate its close ties with the U.S., as evidenced by the Japan-U.S.  Peace Treaty, Treaty for Friendship and Trade and Katsura-Taft Treaty and others.
					
					 But behind the scene, Japan bolstered up its economic and military muscle and did not hesitate to ignite a bloody war against its ally once a good chance came.
					
					 That is why Japan is censured worldwide as a country that cannot be trusted and the one reminiscent of "Pandora's box" in the region.
					
					 Asian countries are calling into question the past crimes perpetrated by Japan, keeping sharp vigilance over its militarist moves for reinvasion.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to forget the lesson taught by the Pearl Harbor incident in which it was hit hard on its head by Japan while conniving at and patronizing the Japanese imperialists' moves for military expansion and overseas aggression in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Authorities' "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Authorities' "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are now getting ever more reckless in anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. This is stoking distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and pushing the bedeviled inter-Korean relations to a more uncontrollable catastrophe, thereby rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula so tense that a war may break out any moment.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article. 
					
					 The "human rights" racket kicked off by the south Korean authorities reveals their criminal intention to save the confrontation strategy from the danger of bankruptcy caused by the failure of their anti-DPRK nuclear row and step up their moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The "human rights" racket and nuclear row against the DPRK can be called twin levers of the south Korean authorities for escalating confrontation with their fellow countrymen in the north. When their anti-DPRK nuclear row failed to work on the DPRK and proved futile, the group of traitors in south Korea is foolishly trying to realize their deep-rooted ambition for invading the north by ratcheting up the "human rights" racket. 
					
					 Their "human rights" racket is nothing but a cynical ploy to cover up the miserable human rights situation caused by their unpopular rule and tide over the ruling crisis by diverting the people's attention elsewhere. 
					
					 It is shameful, indeed, for the puppet regime to defame the most advantageous socialist system centered on the popular masses in the north after turning south Korea into a veritable hell and the worst tundra of human rights in the world. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to mind their own business before talking about "human rights" in the north. 
					
					 Their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket will only bring disgrace and miserable destruction to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime's Cynical Ploy to Slander North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Regime's Cynical Ploy to Slander North
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- During his recent visit to Seoul Obama, under the strong pressure of the south Korean people, staged the farce of returning to south Korea nine pieces of cultural treasures including the state seal dating back to the Korean Feudal Dynasty looted by the U.S. imperialist forces of aggression during the past Korean war. To all Koreans' surprise, Chongwadae groundlessly claimed that the cultural treasures had been "looted by the north."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a cynical ploy and baseless provocation of the south Korean puppet group to pass the buck for the criminal atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists to the DPRK and do harm to their compatriots in the north.
					
					 The commentary cites just a few examples to prove that more than century-long history of U.S. aggression of Korea is woven with its savage plunder of precious cultural treasures of Korea.
					
					 The puppet group should curse the U.S. and force it to pay dearly for what it looted in Korea.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is, however, kowtowing to the U.S. while groundlessly pulling up the north. This goes to prove that it is nothing but hordes of sleazy and mean colonial servants and traitors to the nation.
					
					 Disclosing the ulterior aim sought by the puppet group in floating the fiction about "the north's plunder of the above-said cultural treasures", the commentary notes:
					
					 When south Korea turned into a mourner's house as all its people deeply grieved over the huge casualties caused by the Sewol ferry sinking, Park invited her American master to tour it, shamelessly swishing her skirt, and staged a confab over the issue of escalating the confrontation and war moves. Consequently, she has become a target of all Koreans' condemnation. 
					
					 Thrown into an extreme crisis, the Park group seized Obama's return of those cultural treasures as a good chance to spread the above-said fiction in a bid to stoke bad blood towards the compatriots in the north and thus divert the people's attention elsewhere.
					
					 The world does not know such wicked group of quislings and depraved lackeys as the Park group.
					
					 The south Korean people should immediately oust such despicable traitor and confrontation maniac as Park in order to retake the dignity and sovereignty and realize the reconciliation and unity of the north and the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Accountable for Ferry Sewol Tragedy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds S. Korean Authorities Accountable for Ferry Sewol Tragedy
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The ferry Sewol sinking in the waters off Jin Island, south Korea was not an accidental case but an inevitable product of the unpopular politics of the incompetent puppet authorities, says Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in a commentary. 
					 It goes on: The disaster which claimed huge casualties was caused by the illegal practices of greedy ship owners utterly indifferent to the safety of passengers and elementary safety regulations and the present ruling forces of south Korea were chiefly to blame for the tragedy as they shut their eyes to them and connived at and patronized them.
					
					 The ferry sinking tragedy and what happened after it bring to light the irresponsible stand of the corrupt and incompetent Park Geun Hye group seeking only luxury and keen on maintaining power, not caring about the fate of the people, and shows a glimpse of the rotten and ailing south Korean society.
					
					 Park made much fuss, making a formal "apology" for the accident, passing the buck for it to some yesmen and firing them and visiting incense-mourning altars to "console" bereaved families of the dead. This was, however, nothing but crocodile tears intended to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry public.
					
					 What is absolutely intolerable is that the Park group invited U.S. President Obama to tour south Korea and incited confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and kicked up hysteria for a war against it at a time when the whole of south Korea turned into a mourners' house due to the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					
					 No wonder, even Western media commented Park Geun Hye is not a human being, much less being a president.
					
					 No one can vouch that the second and third disaster more horrible than the Sewol tragedy will not occur as long as the Park group's unpopular rule goes on.
					
					 The group is just waiting for its unfavorable situation to come to an end, taking a hands-off approach towards the Sewol tragedy. It is, however, seriously mistaken.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Re-extend Transfer of Wartime Operation Control Censured
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Moves to Re-extend Transfer of Wartime Operation Control Censured
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye implored Obama to re-extend the transfer of wartime operation control during his recent visit to south Korea. As a result, the period of the transfer has been extended again to the period after 2015.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says this is a hideous act of treachery aimed to put into practice the design to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north through a military nexus with the U.S.
					
					 This is a product of a despicable act of treachery of the U.S. lackeys to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north with the help of outsiders, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Park realized Obama's south Korean trip which was not included in his itinerary and wrested an approval for the re-extension of the transfer, a fact proving that she is a hideous confrontational maniac far surpassing her predecessors.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the Park group agreed to purchase lots of war hardware including Stealth fighters and reconnaissance drones, cover more funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea and join in the U.S. missile defense system in return for the re-extension of the transfer. This clearly proves that the group is set to offer south Korea as a permanent colony of the U.S. and to stand in confrontation with its fellow countrymen in the north through armed buildup.
					
					 Confrontation with fellow countrymen is bound to lead to a war as shown by the north-south relations in the past.
					
					 The Park group should own full responsibility for the serious consequences to be entailed by its moves to re-extend the transfer of the wartime operation control.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Blasted for Evading Responsibility for Sunken Ferry Case
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Blasted for Evading Responsibility for Sunken Ferry Case
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a commentary on April 30 denounced the Park Geun Hye group for trying hard to evade the responsibility for the sinking of the ferry Sewol.
					 Defying the public demand for an apology to the people, Park held a "cabinet meeting" at which she staged the hypocritical farce of making an apology, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 The "president" and Chongwadae obliged to take responsibility for the lives and safety of people are shunning the operation to rescue those missing, while being keen to evade the responsibility for the sinking.
					
					 Park should stop making a sham apology but should properly know what the responsibility of Chongwadae is and what the bereaved families wish, it held.
					
					 They should take measures of prioritizing the safety of the people, far from trumpeting about "reform" and "disaster control center" regarding the sinking case.

articles.title: Harmful Nature of Bill on Annuity Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Harmful Nature of Bill on Annuity Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- 137 south Korean university professors and researchers made public a declaration against the bill on initial annuity proposed by the puppet government on April 30, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 The declaration said the bill proposed by the Park Geun Hye regime and the Saenuri Party has serious defects.
					
					 It called for reexamining the bill, not making it a law in haste as it violates and seriously hurt the interests of the people.

articles.title: Obama's Tour of S. Korea Denounced by British Organizations
articles.content:
Obama's Tour of S. Korea Denounced by British Organizations
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- British progressive organizations including the British Friendship Society with Korea on April 29 released a joint statement denouncing Obama's tour of south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Obama fully revealed his ambition for a war of aggression to overthrow the socialist system in the DPRK during his junket to south Korea.
					
					 He even visited the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" at which he said the U.S. would use armed forces against the DPRK and impose tougher "sanctions" on it.
					
					 The U.S. spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula by introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea in violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the U.S. chief executive to talk about the non-existent "threat" and "provocation" from the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it tries to torpedo the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses under the pretext of the "human rights".
					
					 If a genuine peace is to be achieved on the Korean peninsula, the U.S. should stop all provocation moves against the DPRK and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Exhibition Held in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Exhibition Held in Brazil
Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work exhibition took place in Ceara, Brazil on April 30.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were Vol. 2 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century," reminiscences of Kim Il Sung, and other works.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were members of the leadership of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, members of the Ceara State Assembly and masses.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-chairman of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, in a speech praised the revolutionary history and exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is translating the plans and desires of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into brilliant realities, the vice-chairman said, expressing support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con constructores militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con constructores militares
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo las fotos de recuerdo con los constructores militares de las unidades 966, 462, 101 y 489 del EPC que realizaron meritos laborales en la construccion del albergue de obreras de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang.
					En el lugar de filmacion, el envio saludo cordial a los constructores militares respondiendo con la mano alzada a las aclamaciones de ellos.
					
					Se retrato con ellos diciendo que el albergue es una creacion orgullosa de la abnegacion patriotica y el modo de trabajo del EPC, abanderado de la lucha por materializar el proposito del Partido y defender la politica del Partido.
					
					Gracias a la lucha heroica del EPC, se crean sucesivamente por doquier del pais los milagros que sorprenden a todo el mundo, apunto y expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los constructores militares mantendran el honor de vanguardias en la lucha valiosa por edificar un Estado prospero y cumpliran con su mision como defensores de la patria y creadores de la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Hwang Pyong So, Jang Jong Nam y Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de entidad china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de entidad china
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el Instituto de Relaciones Internacionales Contemporaneas de China.
					Fu Mengzi, vicepresidente de dicho instituto y jefe de la delegacion de esta entidad, de visita en Corea, lo traslado hoy a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Guatemala
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Guatemala
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- Gustavo Adolfo Lopez Calderon presento hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Guatemala en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Acto por 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto por 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa el acto por el 40o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "La prensa de nuestro Partido es una poderosa arma ideologica que coadyuva a la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche". 
					La obra publicada el 7 de mayo del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche dilucida globalmente el caracter, la mision, los principios de actividades y el deber de las publicaciones kimilsungistas y los remedios para su cumplimiento. 
					
					En el acto participaron el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de los ministerios, organos centrales y de la rama de prensa, periodistas y hombres de prensa. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, Kim Ki Nam dijo que la obra da respuestas cientificas a los problemas teoricos y practicos que se presentan en fortalecer las publicaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como arma ideologica mas revolucionaria y combativa que sirva para el cumplimiento de la idea y la causa del lider. 
					
					Recordo que bajo la guia del partido y el lider, se han materializado con brillantez durante 40 anos pasados las ideas y teorias presentadas en la obra, renovado la fisonomia de las publicaciones del partido y manifestado plenamente su poderio combativo. 
					
					Continuo que las proezas del Dirigente se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El historico discurso del Mariscal "Anticipemos la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria", pronunciado en la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del PTC, fue un acontecimiento especial que abrio una coyuntura de viraje radical en la propaganda publicitaria para cumplir con exito las importantes tareas presentadas ante la labor ideologica del partido, afirmo y llamo a los periodistas y hombres de prensa a tomar la delantera de la marcha por la victoria final cumpliendo el papel de trompeteros de la guerrilla antijaponesa.

articles.title: Inaugurado X Festival Nacional de Diseno Mecanico
articles.content:
Inaugurado X Festival Nacional de Diseno Mecanico
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el X Festival Nacional del Diseno Mecanico con la participacion de los disenadores, profesores, investigadores, tecnicos y miembros de los grupos por las tres revoluciones de mas de 130 unidades inclusive las instituciones de diseno, las de creacion de bellas artes industriales, educacion e investigacion cientifica.
					En la ocasion se exhibiran y se publicaran los datos de investigacion y los programas para desarrollar el diseno de los productos mecanicos y la tecnica disenadora inclusive las sofisticadas maquinas herramientas y las maquinas extractivas, electricas, rotativas, constructores, textiles, alimentarias y agricolas.
					
					Y se realizara el concurso sobre los disenos de varios tipos de aparatos de ejecucion, impresion y control necesarios a aplicar la tecnologia teledirigida, el sistema de control universal y CNC y sobre los disenos y proyectos de los equipos necesarios a la tecnica renovable de energia y materias primas y recursos.
					
					Tambien se efectuaran el concurso de diseno multidimensional, la leccion sobre la tendencia del desarrollo de diseno mecanico y la tecnica sofisticada y el intercambio y servicio tecnicos sobre los datos tecnicos del diseno ultramoderno y los productos exhibidos.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 6 en el pabellon central de las muestras de productos de la industria ligera.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Ri Jong Guk, ministro de Industria Mecanica, Choe Sang Gon, presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los funcionarios y trabajadores de las instituciones del diseno mecanico y las de creacion de bellas artes industriales, educacion y investigacion cientifica.
					
					Al termino del acto, los participantes recorrieron el lugar del festival.

articles.title: ACNC comenta politica de EE.UU. sobre Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta politica de EE.UU. sobre Japon
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- Durante su reciente visita a Japon, Obama expreso por primera vez en calidad del presidente norteamericano el apoyo oficial a la voluntad de Japon de ejercer el derecho a la autodefensa colectiva.
					Esto es la nitida expresion de la naturaleza bandidesca del imperio norteamericano que trata de usar el pais isleno como brigada de choque en la realizacion de su estrategia de heguemonia mundial, lo que significa un acto suicida.
					
					Ahora, para ejecutar su agresiva estrategia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. instiga las maniobras de Japon encaminadas a preparar los aparatos juridicos e institucionales para el cumplimiento de guerra, tales como el aumento armamentista y el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa colectiva.
					
					Japon es un pais criminal castigado severamente por la sociedad internacional debido a sus crimenes de agresion cometidos en el siglo pasado. Y es un Estado peligroso que acecha la oportunidad de nueva agresion, en vez de liquidar con esfuerzos sinceros los crimenes pasados.
					
					Si se permite a Japon el ejercicio del citado derecho prohibido despues de la guerra por el orden internacional y las leyes de ese pais insular, sera evidente que Japon lo usaria como espacio criminal para legalizar la reagresion.
					
					A fin de realizar su ambicion de heguemonia mundial, EE.UU. no vacila en imponer sobre la humanidad la otra catastrofe.
					
					Es muy peligrosa para EE.UU. que historicamente sufrio fracaso en la ejecucion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC utilizar Japon en la ambicion de alcanzar su meta.
					
					A juzgar el caracter astuto y brutal de Japon, no hay garantia de que la politica de EE.UU. sobre Japon no de consecuencia suicida.
					
					En el pasado, Japon escenifico bien su figura intima con EE.UU. mediante la concertacion del Tratado de Paz Japon-EE.UU., el Tratado de Amistad y Comercio Japon-EE.UU. el Tratado de Taft-Katsura y otros.
					
					Pero, detras de esta cortina, Japon fortalecio sus fuerzas economicas y militares y en el momento oportuno desarrollo sin vacilacion alguna la guerra de conquista de colonia contra su aliado.
					
					Por esta razon, Japon es considerado en la escena internacional como pais desconfiado  al igual a la "caja de Pandora" que contiene la chispa de todas las desgracias y las calamidades.
					
					Por eso, los paises asiaticos cuestionan el crimen del pasado de Japon y observan con precaucion las maniobras de reagresion militarista de este pais isleno.
					
					Seria mejor que EE.UU. se reflexione en las lecciones de Pearl Harbour, que fue atacado por Japon, al cabo de la tolerancia e instigacion de la expansion militarista y la agresion al ultramar de Japon.

articles.title: Tragedia del barco "Sewol" es producto inevitable de la politica antipopular, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Tragedia del barco "Sewol" es producto inevitable de la politica antipopular, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 6 de mayo (ACNC) -- El hundimiento del barco de pasajeros "Sewol" en el mar frente a la isla Jin del Sur de Corea no es el accidental sino producto inevitable de la politica antipopular de las corruptas e impotentes autoridades titeres del Sur de Corea.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					La presente tragedia con el saldo de muchas perdidas humanas partio del acto ilegal de navieros malos que para ganar el dinero, no toman en consideracion la vida humana ni la elemental regla de seguridad.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas son las responsables principales que protegieron a esos propietarios de barco haciendo vista gorda de sus actos ilegales.
					
					La tragedia del barco "Sewol" y la situacion posterior demuestran la corrupcion, la incapacidad y la posicion irresponsable de la banda de Park Geun-hye y un aspecto de la sociedad surcoreana que se torna cada dia mas corrupta debido a ello.
					
					En relacion con el presente caso, Park libro la farsa de "pedir disculpas" y destituyo a sus lacayos imputandoles la responsabilidad del incidente y visito el lugar de quema de incienso en memoria de los difuntos, pero esto no pasa de ser las lagrimas de cocodrilo para distraer la atencion de la opinion publica indignada.
					
					Para colmo, cuando todo el territorio surcoreano estuvo en duelo, la banda de Park invito hasta al presidente norteamericano Obama al Sur de Corea para fomentar la confrontacion fratricida y la campana belica contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					Hasta los medios occidentales critican que "Park Geun-hye no es humana siquiera, lejos de ser 'presidenta'".
					
					Mientras prosigue la politica anti-popular de la horda de Park, no hay la garantia de que no se repitan los accidentes como la tragedia del barco "Sewol".
					
					Ahora tambien los compinches de Park Geun-hye no toman medidas pertinentes para remediar la catastrofe esperando solo el cambio de la coyuntura a favor de si mismos.
					
					 Pero, ellos estan equivocados.
